body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements the CutBased PhotonID RunIII Winter22 in miniAOD and nanoAOD. The main changes are: 1) H/E variable is now cone-based instead of tower-based (as was in Run2 Fall17 ID); 2) PF Photon Isolation and Neutral Hadron isolation variables are now replaced by ECal Cluster Isolation and HCal Cluster Isolation; 3) H/E variable is now pile-up corrected with quadratic polynomial in rho; 4) Pile-up correction with quadratic polynomial in rho is done for isolation variables as well. 
Additional documentation can be found in the following:
1. https://indico.cern.ch/event/1204275/#5-update-on-run3-photon-cut-ba
2. https://indico.cern.ch/event/1204277/#5-update-on-run3-photon-cut-ba  

#### PR validation:

The PR has been tested using the following workflows by running 'runTheMatrix.py'
1) 12434.0    
2) 11834.0    
3) 10024.0    
4) 136.874
